divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my patio having a cigarette, when I noticed something in the sky. The "object" was very high up. I see a lot of planes in the area, this "object" was much much higher than what I am used to seeing. At first I thought it was a satellite, but realized that it was to bright of a sky to see any satellites( I know you can see them at dusk or at night, but not this time of day) It moved slowly across the sky. I went inside to get a pair of binoculars, when I came back it took me about 30 sec to find it again. It looked like it was spherical in shape and shiny metallic color. I watched it for about 7 to 8 mins before I lost it against the bright blue sky.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around August 23rd 2008
Summary: The object (sphere) was high in the sky( a lot higher than normal aircraft around here that I've seen)
